data.title: Land Evidence Records Information
data.text:
Recording Times:

Monday-Wednesday: 8:00am - 3:30pm

Thursday: 8:00am - 5:30pm

Friday: 8:00am - 12:30pm

Recording Fees:

FEES Include $4 Rhode Island Historical Records Trust fee. (RIGL 42-8.1-20)

Warranty Deed $84 plus $1 for each additional page

Quit Claim Deed $84 plus $1 for each additional page

Deed of Executor, Administrator Trustee, Conservator, Receiver or Commissioner $84 plus $1 for each additional page

Mortgage $64 plus $1 for each additional page

Partial release of mortgage $49 plus $1 for each additional page

Assignment of mortgage $49 plus $1 for each additional page

Foreclosure deed under power of sale with affidavit $84 plus $1 for each additional page

Lease $64 plus $1 for each additional page

General assignment $49 plus $1 for each additional page

Discharge of mortgage $49 plus $1 for each additional page

Mechanicâ€™s lien $14 (No Change-Notice of Intention)

Writ of Attachment or Execution affecting mobile & manufactured homes $14 (No Change)

Discharge of attachment or execution $49 plus $1 for each additional page

Any other instrument not otherwise expressly provided for by statue $49 for $1 each additional page

Lien-Federal tax $11.25 plus $1 for each additional page

Lien-Federal tax, discharge of $11.25 plus $1 for each additional page

Maps,plats, surveys,drawings (not attached to or a part of another recordable instrument) $49

Bill of sale $49 plus $1 for each additional page

Power of attorney $49 plus $1 for each additional page

Lis pendens $84 plus $1 for each additional page

UCC 1-2 pages $16

UCC 3+ pages $32

Easement $49 plus $1 for each additional page

Municipal Lien Certificate-MLC $8 per parcel

House Meter Affidavit No Charge

Zoning Certificate No Charge

Non-Resident Landlord No Charge

Copies $1 per page

Certified Copies $3.50 for the first page and $1.50 for each additional page

Auxiliary Fields

City Clerk
